77043.affected_area: Calgary (North of Bow River, East of Highway 1A and West of Highway 2)
77043.summary: Some customers in Calgary North of Bow River, East of Highway 1A and West of Highway 2 are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. This is including the following neighborhoods; Balmoral, Brentwood, Bridgeland - Riverside, Capitol Hill, Charleswood, Collingwood, Crescent Heights, Hillhurst, Mayfair, Mountview, Mt Pleasant, National, North Haven, Renfrew, Rosemont, Sunnyside, & Tuxedo Park We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
